org.modelio.gproject.gproject

Class GProject

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.modelio.gproject.gproject.GProject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GRemoteProject

    public class GProject
extends Object
    Represents a Modelio project.

    The project physical structure is documented here: https://forge-modelio.softeam.com/projects/modelio-phoenix/wiki/Project_space_structure

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String DATA_SUBDIR
      Project sub directory name where persistent data are stored.
      protected static String MODULES_SUBDIR
      "data" sub directory where module data are stored.

    • Method Detail

      • close

        public void close()
        Close the project and release the resources.

      • getAuthConfiguration

        public GAuthConf getAuthConfiguration()
        Returns:
        the project authentication configuration or null.

      • getFragment

        public IProjectFragment getFragment(MObject obj)
        Get the fragment owning the given model object.

        Returns null if the model object is not managed by a fragment.

        Parameters:
        obj - a model object.
        Returns:
        its fragment or null.

      • getFragments

        public List<IProjectFragment> getFragments()
        Get the list of all model fragments.

        This list is not modifiable and is modified when a fragment or a module is added or removed.

        Returns:
        all model fragments.

      • getModuleCatalog

        public IModuleCatalog getModuleCatalog()
        Returns:
        the modules catalog

      • getModules

        public List<GModule> getModules()
        Get the list of all GModules installed in this project.
        Returns:
        a GModule list.

      • getMonitorSupport

        public GProjectMonitorSupport getMonitorSupport()
        Get project monitoring support.

        Allows to add, remove and fires GProject monitors.

        Returns:
        the monitor support.

      • getName

        public String getName()
        Get the project's name.
        Returns:
        the project's name.

      • getOwnFragments

        public List<IProjectFragment> getOwnFragments()
        Get the list of the project fragments registered with registerFragment(IProjectFragment, IModelioProgress) .

        Fragments provided by modules are excluded from the list.

        This list is not modifiable and reflect changes when a fragment registered or removed.

        Returns:
        registered project fragments.

      • getProject

        public static GProject getProject(MObject obj)
        Get the GProject owning the given model object.

        Returns null if the model object is not managed by a GProject.

        Parameters:
        obj - a model object.
        Returns:
        its GProject or null.

      • getProjectDataPath

        public Path getProjectDataPath()
        Get the directory where the project data are managed by Modelio (model, fragments modules and so on). The internal structure of this directory is left to its users (fragments, modules, CMS tools ...) User generated data like source code, documentation are never stored there.
        Returns:
        the path where the 'data' directory resides.

      • getProjectPath

        public Path getProjectPath()
        Get the project directory i.e. the project.conf location.
        Returns:
        the directory containing the project.conf.

      • getProjectRuntimePath

        public Path getProjectRuntimePath()
        The .runtime directory of the project, used to store copies of the resource files that might require an update while the application is running. Typical example: module jar files that would be locked otherwise.
        Returns:
        The .runtime directory

      • getProperties

        public GProperties getProperties()
        Get the properties stored in the project.
        Returns:
        the current set of properties.

      • getRemoteLocation

        public String getRemoteLocation()
        Get the project remote location.

        Returns null for local projects.

        Returns:
        the project remote location.

      • getSession

        public ICoreSession getSession()
        Get the core session corresponding to this project.
        Returns:
        a CoreSession. Might be null if the project is closed.

      • getType

        public ProjectType getType()
        Get the project type.

        This method should be redefined by subclasses.

        Returns:
        the project type.

      • installModule

        public GModule installModule(IModuleHandle moduleHandle,
                    Path moduleArchivePath)
                      throws IOException
        Add a new module in the project.

        If the project is currently opened, the MDA fragment of the module is mounted in the project.

        Parameters:
        moduleHandle - the module to deploy
        moduleArchivePath - the .jmdac archive to deploy
        Returns:
        the instantiated module
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of failure.

      • isOpen

        public boolean isOpen()
        Indicates whether or not the project is opened.
        Returns:
        true if there is a core session.

      • reconfigureProperties

        public void reconfigureProperties(GProperties newDesc,
                         IModelioProgress monitor)
        Reconfigure the project properties with the given new descriptor.

        The default implementation replaces the project properties. This method may be redefined to have another behavior.

        Parameters:
        newDesc - the new project description
        monitor - a progress monitor

      • registerFragment

        public void registerFragment(IProjectFragment fragment,
                    IModelioProgress aMonitor)
                      throws FragmentConflictException
        Register a fragment in the project.

        The method mounts the fragment but it does not create any data for the fragment.

        Parameters:
        fragment - the project fragment to register.
        aMonitor - a progress monitor.
        Throws:
        FragmentConflictException - if a fragment with same identifier or URI is already registered

      • removeModule

        public void removeModule(GModule module)
        Remove module from project. If the project is currently opened, the MDA fragment of the module is dismounted from the project.
        Parameters:
        module - the module to remove from the project.

      • save

        public void save(IModelioProgress progress)
          throws IOException
        Save the model and the project description.
        Parameters:
        progress - a Modelio progress monitor
        Throws:
        IOException - if a repository failed to save.

      • unregisterFragment

        public void unregisterFragment(IProjectFragment fragment)
        Unregisters a fragment in the project.

        The method unmount the fragment but it does not 'delete' the fragment physical data.

        Parameters:
        fragment - the project fragment to register.

      • copyJmdacToModuleDir

        protected boolean copyJmdacToModuleDir(URI anUri,
                           IAuthData authData,
                           Path copyTo)
                                throws IOException
        Copy the URI content to a given Path .

      • If the URI represents a file directory, uses the represented Path.
      • If the URI represents a relative path, resolve it against the project path.
      • In the other case try to open an URL connection to copy the file to the given file path.
Parameters:
anUri - the URI to copy.
copyTo - the path to copy the URI content to.
Throws:
IOException - if the URI couldn't be resolved.

  • initialize

    protected void initialize(ProjectDescriptor projectDescriptor,
              IAuthData authData,
              IModuleCatalog aModuleCatalog,
              IModelioProgress aProgress)
                   throws IOException
    Initialize the project from a project descriptor.

    This method may be redefined in sub classes. In this case super.initialize(...) should be called at the end.

    Parameters:
    projectDescriptor - a project descriptor.
    authData - optional authentication data. If non null it overrides the authentication descriptor.
    aModuleCatalog - the modules catalog.
    aProgress - a progress monitor
    Throws:
    IOException - in case of I/O error preventing the project from being instantiated

  • loadDescriptor

    protected final void loadDescriptor(ProjectDescriptor projectDescriptor,
                  IModelioProgress aProgress)
    Setup the project from the descriptor.

    Add the described fragments and the modules without mounting them.

    Parameters:
    projectDescriptor - a project descriptor
    aProgress - a progress monitor.

  • saveProjectDescription

    protected void saveProjectDescription()
                               throws IOException
    Save the project description in its "project.conf" file.
    Throws:
    IOException - in case of failure.

  • setRemoteLocation

    protected void setRemoteLocation(String remoteLocation)
                          throws URISyntaxException
    Updates the project remote location.

    • To be called only by GProjectConfigurer.
    • To be redefined by remote project implementations.
    Parameters:
    remoteLocation - the new project remote location.
    Throws:
    URISyntaxException - if the given location is invalid

  • needsReconfiguration

    protected boolean needsReconfiguration(ProjectDescriptor serverDesc)
    Tells whether the project configuration is different than the current configuration.

    May be redefined if simply comparing descriptors is not enough.

    Parameters:
    serverDesc - a server project configuration
    Returns:
    true if the project configuration is different.
